page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT & TRADE
page.content:
PAGE 11 CONTINUED
{SWEDISH WEAVING SHOP}is a specialist weaving shop which was opened in 1983. It closes in January and February. {THE HAYLOFT CAFE}has been open for 8 years.It closes from November-March. The{RAKE-A-ROUND}has been open since 1980.It is a second hand antique shop which closes for a month at christmas. {FRUIT BASKET}has been open since 1983 and is open all the year round. {KIND KYTTOCKS KITCHEN}has been open for 15 years before which it was a cobblers.It is open all year except January. {HELEN'S HAIRDRESSER}has been in existence for 14 years,yet it has been under its present ownership for only 2. more on next page
